reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Fostering cooperation on infrastructure and utilities and their investment and financing by way of concession between China and UK (Part B)

description.narrative: The project aims to will have strengthened Chinese knowledge of infrastructure investment and policy dialogues between the participants within the area of infrastructure and utilities, and their investment and financing by way of concession. It will establish and strengthen the related legal and market systems, improving the sustainability, quality and efficiency of public services, and promote steady and sustainable economic growth.

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
